snippet.title: Seed of Nostalgia - Official Gameplay Trailer 2025 - New #pixelart #jrpg
snippet.description:
BACK US ON KICKSTARTER! Coming April 7th!
Be sure to follow us and click the link to be notified as soon as our campaign goes live!
LINK: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/primitivepixels/seed-of-nostalgia

Wishlist Seed of Nostalgia on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1894140/Seed_of_Nostalgia/

Join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/G5f7H2KUcd
Follow us on X: https://x.com/PrimPixelsGames
Follow us on Bsky: https://bsky.app/profile/primitivepixels.bsky.social

A Timeless Quest in a World of Legends
Enter the world of Seed of Nostalgia, a story-rich JRPG blending the heart of classic 16-bit adventures with player focused game design. Join Atilla and his allies as they journey across the breathtaking landscapes of Sylvara, uncover ancient secrets, and face a celestial truth that will determine the fate of their world. Experience a tale of courage, mystery, and sacrifice that harkens back to the golden era of the genre.

Trailer music and Original Soundtrack by: Mushra at Mushra Games
Itch: https://mushragames.itch.io/
X: https://x.com/jrpgcomposer

Key art by Marcel Mosqi
Bsky: https://bsky.app/profile/mosqi.bsky.social

Animation by NetherTales Studio
https://www.nethertales.studio/
X: https://x.com/nethertalesent?s=21&t=G7Cce74GU7cY5wnW02BTPw

#gaming  #games  #indiegame  #indiegames  #rpg  #jrpggames  #retrogaming  #snes  #ps1  #16bit  #32bit  #chronotrigger  #goldensun  #finalfantasy  #secretofmana
